location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Jonathan Duncan, the Honourable Governor and President in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident, Bushire, forwards accounts (not included) for the Bushire factory up to 30 April 1802. The Resident informs Jonathan Duncan of Samuel Manesty's recent request for 24,000 pisasters [piasters]. Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun states that because he did not have that amount in cash he procured a draft - payable at Bussora [Basra] to the Resident, from the merchants at Bushire, and debted [debited] to the Honourable Company - which he forwarded to Bussora.
